places_with_reviews.name: Krishna Beach Resort
address: Palliyamoola Chalad, P.O, Alavil - Azhikode Rd, Chalad, Kannur, Kerala 670008, India

reviews.text: This resort is an architectural marvel. Pictures do not do justice to this place. Location is good, with a shortcut to the beach. However, view from the rooms is partially blocked because of trees within the campus. Rooms are very big in size. Balconies are also huge. But mosquitoes would not allow you to have a relaxed time there. Apart from that, the resort offers five-star hospitality, the staff was extremely polite and professional. Breakfast buffet was very good. Dinner buffet was also decent. Overall, a memorable stay.

Krishna Beach Resort exceeded my expectations during my first visit for a function. The ambiance of the resort and it's surroundings were superb , creating a serene atmosphere .. The food served was also good, adding to the overall experience..The hall where our function took place was spacious, providing ample room for everyone to enjoy themselves during the function.  I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable and enjoyable event experience..❤️❤️

The stay at KBR was very comfortable. The room was very clean and spacious. The breakfast buffet had a good variety with good Kerala delicacies. The auditorium was large enough for the group. The lunch and dinner services were excellent and the food very tasty. The negative points included poor audiovisual facilities in the hall and the sultry sweaty open air facilities. Some outdoor fans would have helped

I stayed here for a day with family. Fourwheeler parking facility is available. But if any function is there in this resort, parking is a mess. I met a similar incident as I couldn't take my car out as several cars which came for the function parked irresponsibly obstructing my car. There are several Watchmen , but of no use. Resort stay was good, food was average. Location of the resort is awesome. The campus is great and we can take nice pictures.

We held 2 functions at Krishna beach resort: our engagement & our wedding. We had taken some rooms also on both occasions. It was so easy because they took care of almost everything in 1-2 packages. Food was great ! The stage and decorations were beautiful. The priest/pandit they arranged was very good. As requested, the marriage certificate from the resort was ready on time. Overall, everyone was happy with all of the food, rooms and arrangements. A big thanks to Krishna beach resort for arranging everything beautifully & special thanks to manager Ajay for full support and flexibility throughout.

places_with_reviews.name: MAGNET HOTEL KANNUR

reviews.text:
There is no scenic view from the spot, but gives a better ambience with the Banyan tree in the front. Also the sculpture at reception gives an attire of being at folklore region.

Front office staff is friendly and responds to queries.

Food is nice and not exceptional in quality, and presented nicely giving you a bit of luxury feel. With ample parking space and dining space never use to be crowded.

Room rents are on a higher side when compared to similar ones in close vicinity. No comments on rooms, as I never experienced it.

Most important fact is that, negative comments on review are not responded. Responses to such comments gives a feeling that things are being addressed and continuously improving.

The hotel was really good. We went for a wedding reception. The hall was spacious and the food served was extremely good.
Ample parking facility is available. The ambience and the view from the top is also good.

Room and food was good. Service was nice. Arranged transportation according to our need. Only annoying thing was they made wait during checkout to check the room and ensure everything is present in room. A person who booked the room for 10k what he will steal from there, towels?. First time i faced this from a hotel.

Lovely property. Had a pleasant stay. Rooms are quite good. Well arranged and spacious. Even the lobby areas and corridors are maintained properly.
Restaurant is also nice, Just got a chance to stay overnight only. So had opportunity to try out breakfast only. But will visit again in future

We were excited to celebrate Vishu with a traditional Sadhya meal, but unfortunately, our experience fell short this time. The service was lacking, and the food lacked proper seasoning(salt), which was very disappointing. Despite having enjoyed our visits in the past, this experience didn't meet our expectations."

places_with_reviews.name: Pranav Beach Resort
address: Beach Rd, Chalad, Palliyanmoola, Kerala 670008, India

reviews.text:
We had the immense pleasure of organizing my son's wedding , and it was nothing short of spectacular. The venue's location, with its breathtaking sea-facing views, provided a stunning backdrop for the celebration. The charm of the sea, combined with the elegant setting, made for unforgettable memories.

The villas, where we and our guests stayed, were exceptional. Each room was neat and clean.

What stood out to us, apart from the beautiful location and facilities, were the amenities provided. The  amenities added an extra layer of comfort and enjoyment to our stay.

Pranav Resort  offered the perfect setting for my son's wedding, combining natural beauty, luxurious accommodation, and exceptional service. We are deeply grateful to the staff and management for their part in making the event so special. I highly recommend   to anyone looking to organize a wedding or any celebration that calls for a beautiful, serene, and well-equipped venue.

Peaceful place for relax. Pranav beach resort is near payyambalam beach, light house , St. Angelo etc at Kannur. Under coconut trees there is few traditional type cottage with neat and tidy interiors which are attracting more foreigners as well. Beach is few steps away from this property. Staffs n management are very service oriented. Best experience..

I saw so many negative  reviews... But we stayed there a week ago to explore the town. We came from Bangalore.. and it was an amazing stay here..  they gave us an extra pillow, blanket, and their food was amazing which was complimentary ( breakfast)..  location is too good and huge space for parking...
Right opposite one of the cleanest beaches of Kerala. Perfect location for a wedding function or a vacation. Great simple rooms with decent facilities and staff.

Planned for the vacation, please check any wedding is happening  in this resort ,before booking this place.  we visited the resort on wedding day full traffic no space for parking. No hot water for shower. rooms are ok, washrooms are not clean.

places_with_reviews.name: Marmara Beach House
address: Payyambalam Beach Road, Chalad, Kannur, Kerala 670001, India

reviews.text:
I stayed here with my family for 3N/2D.

-Location is great as its exactly opposite to beach but to reach here you have to use very narrow roads. I guess that's common for all beach houses

-Rooms of two types are available one is beach facing which is little costly over the other which is not facing to beach. And room facing beach are small i.e. convenient for only two persons with huge balcony to enjoy beach view but the other deluxe room (not  facing to beach) is huge literally a family of 4 can stay.

-Service is the only problem of staying here especially for food as  there is no pantry/restaurant attached in this resort so you've to rely on hotels outside (which is good option as per taste and price). But you'll get a complimentary breakfast

In short it is more of a kind of convention centre best suited for any wedding/family functions but value for money to stay
It's a very nice place I actually went for an engagement function i loved the food there. There are lots of varieties in the buffet beautifully arranged. Its near the beach lovely view

Good place is stay with family, just located opposite of beach with beautiful view
Rooms can be improved a bit and break fast is normal, not much variety .
Please don't stay at this resort. There was no hygiene. The bathroom had cockroach. The AC did not work. Totally Don't stay there.
I just been there for a meetup.it is a beach front property with indoor and outdoor space for small meetups.

places_with_reviews.name: Asokam Beach Resort and Ayurveda Chikitsa Kendram
address: Payyambalam Beach Road, Chalad, Palliyamoola, Kerala 670008, India

reviews.text: The resort was good and clean. For the price we paid for the non AC room the room could be a bit bigger. Food in the restaurant attached was very delicious. Breakfast was complementary even though we had not booked for it. Owner was generous

Comfortable, clean and spacious room with modern facilities.

Extra bed supplied for child was very comfortable.

Friendly and helpful staff, assisting us to arrange private transportation and a great price.

Good breakfast for adults and children.

Great pool and well maintained gardens.

Very poorly managed Resort.
Sap: Below average, we had to wait till evening for the Spa & very average spa.
Staff: very cordial, but a lackluster attitude.
Food: Breakfast, below average.
Very poor guest PR & zero Hospitality.
Inspite of taking permission and agreed by the front office staff for extra time for checkout, a message was sent to my mobile for extra charges.
Will not step into this Resort the next time.

I had the best massage i have ever experienced
To be honest, I’m not sure what to write exactly – I wanted to just write: “SHEEJA  is awesome! She gives great massages and is very skilled and professional ” What more could I ask for?
Looking forward to sessions every time i visit Kannur .

Thank you Sheeja ,Thank you Asoka therapy center

Had a good and relaxing stay at Asokam beach resort.property was well maintained and in front of the main beach .rooms were spacious , clean and so was the washroom .
Food was tasty and service was top notch , special mention to Dhanesh who was on his toes to fulfill all our requests.
I would highly recommend to visit this place of you are considering to visit Kannur.

places_with_reviews.name: Anansa Boutique Hotel by The Kannur Club
address: Payyambalam Beach Road, Chalad, Kannur, Kerala 670008, India

reviews.text: like it a lot. If I come to Kannur again, I will definitely choose here. We have everything we need in a small space. Above that are the staff here. Their behavior was very good. They know very well how to treat the people who come there. It is very neat and clean here. Not to mention the food, it tastes great. I wish you all the very best for your new venture. All the best Kannur team.special thanks to Anansa❤️

Great experience, The hotel was located right in front of the beach with a great view. It has a nice garden and a spacious parking spot.
The rooms had a modern look, it has a standing balcony with a view of the beach. The room is nice and spacious.
The staff were nice, the room service was quick and attentive.
The pool was big, with shallow and deep parts and also was of infinity pool style.
The breakfast buffet had many breakfast options and it's flavour was subtle and tasty.

Highly recommend for food! We had a vegetarian dinner here and each and every dish ordered was delicious. The staff are very good and accomodating and the ambience is wonderful. The place also has an awesome outdoor area. Definite go to place.

Best time in Kannur! Lovely view, service, food! Didn’t even feel the need to step out. The beach is right in front so no hassle there as well. The restaurant was amazing too. Akshay served us throughout with a smile. Arun was also very polite and greeted us at every visit to the restaurant. Loved it!

We loved our stay at Anansa ! The service was very warm and friendly, the rooms clean and food great ! The staff was helpful about everything we requested... The view from the hotel is gorgeous, to say the least. We would recommend this place to everyone who would want to unwind at Kannur near the beach ! You will love it

places_with_reviews.name: Arabian Beach Resort
address: Palliyammoola ,Payyambalam Extention, Payyambalam Beach Road, Chalad, Kannur, Kerala 670014, India

reviews.text: A nice hotel facing the beach and with a spacious lawn and parking area in the adjacent compound. A nice place for conducting get to gether and marriage receptions. Food is also good

4.5/5.
Location is too good with ample room space along with an open terrace. Service can be a bit better. Swiggy Zomato works here

Place and location is good but service is poor. Not even soap, towels, TV in room.
Also no food arrangement in the resort had to go outside for it.

Good experience
The place is heaven to conduct celebrations
A great resort..!!! he resort is very secure and they have security personnel  posted for night watch. the breakfast was good. Overall a very satisfying place to stay.

places_with_reviews.name: Luxe Inn
address: Kannur - Alavil - Valapattanam Road, Chalad, Kannur, Kerala 670014, India

reviews.text: If you are looking a budget and neat room in Kannur town this one of the best option. The rooms are good and spacious. Enough space for car parking in the basement.

The Luxe Inn offered a pleasant and quiet retreat, providing a serene atmosphere that was a welcome escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Nestled in a tranquil setting, the peaceful ambiance allowed for a restful stay, creating a perfect environment for relaxation and rejuvenation. The attentive staff and the well-appointed accommodations further enhanced the overall experience, making it a memorable and delightful sojourn.

Service 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
Rooms are good upto the money. But services and hospitality are like lodge rooms. Hotel should be follow hostel standards but here I didn’t feel any as such.
If you are looking for a hotel near to payyambalam beach and your are below 30, please avoid thinking a stay.
Little far from the beach, after 11:30 pm, very difficult to reach there since there is no auto or car services are available.
Not good enough

Little bit far away from the beach.  Good food is not nearby. You need to spend at least 50 rs to get somewhere. Rooms and bathrooms are very clean and spacious. They offered us in 1680 rs per night. Little smell in the bathroom due to faulty plumbing however it is manageable.

A budget friendly hotel room located at the heart of kannur city.
This is well maintained , Neat and clean room
Spacious as well

Ac room is so cheap

Good for family and friends, with quiet atmosphere.

places_with_reviews.name: Kanaka Beach House
address: Payyambalam Beach Road, Palliyamoola, Kannur, Kerala 670008, India

reviews.text: We came here with a wedding party and continued the stay after they left. The rooms are perfect, everything is immaculate. The staff are honestly so helpful, there was nothing they wouldn’t do to help us, whether that’s sending a parcel, arranging an auto or bus journey, making us breakfast and chai. We are so sad to be leaving here, it’s so peaceful and seconds away from the beach!

Superb Stay ...Had my best Time at Kannur: Thanks to Savid especially for making the stay comfortable and ensured everything in place timely.
Kudos to Kanaka beach house Team.

Property is located just beside of sea beach. You can even have a full view of the sea from your bed.

It's a pet friendly property.
Pet lovers know how difficult it is to get a pet friendly property in India.

Rooms are very neat and clean. All required amenities are available in the room.

Ample parking place available. where we have enjoyed playing football and cricket without damaging the property and parked vehicle.

Now coming to the best part of it. The service is just awesome and the mouth watering food we had here during our stay is unforgettable.

Even the owner of the property personally visited to know if any issues we are facing. it was a heart touching gesture.

Icing on the top was, they have a small tree cafe. it was a rainy day and the sea looks fabulous from the tree cafe.

We have thoroughly enjoyed our stay in this property also like to recommend others as well. Just have a word with them, you will definitely find a connection.

The room is basic but the location is awesome the beach is just across the road.

The near by beach is very dirty but have water sports facilities.

I went here to attend a marriage reception from my relative side. The location is obviously good, at least while coming from the Taliparamba side as you don't need to bother about Puthiyatheru traffic. Take Alvil road and pretty much a good route to this place.
For parking, they have a good ample place in an adjacent open plot. The only problem is to step inside it when it rains.
Coming to the service and ambience, the place is bigger than expected. It can easily room, more than 100 people in their garden area. Proper place for stage and good sitting area. The opposite view is of the Arabian Sea which is scenic.
You can always consider this venue for any program and event.

places_with_reviews.name: Meenkunnu Beach Resort
address: W859+6XM, Azhikode, Azhikode South, Kerala 670009, India

reviews.text: It was a great experience. Our host was very helpful. He was extremely polite and helpful. He helped us plan our itinerary. Also the location is perfect, away from the city, close to nature and spacious. The beach is close to resort and walkable and very private. Had a great stay at the resort.

Very nicely managed resort, away from the city traffic and noise. Good for family and friends gatherings. Very pleasant & charming owners with whom it felt like we were staying at our friend's home only. Adjacent to a very calm and isolated beach named Meenkunnu. Go for a stay here if you want to spend a peaceful day.
The place is scenic in itself. While the building is kind of old, the location and the service over shadows this.

Perfect stay away from the hustle and bustle of the town. Don't go by the reviews given by these privileged and entitled “tourists”. Uncle and aunty really took care of us and were really helpful. The caretaker, Unni was just a phonecall away and helped us order food. We had the whole property to ourselves! So peaceful and the view of sea from the cliff is amazing! The best part, they're pet friendly too! Yes the hosts don't live on the property, but that doesn't mean they're not available in case you need to order food or anything. Aunty made us amazing breakfast everyday. Definitely staying here again.

So let's start the honest review, what I'm writing here so see how useless I'm feeling here.
So the owner is very good and kind, the property (if maintained properly) is beautiful that's two points are positive
The care taker is not from this planet, I don't know what to say, he is in his own world. Who won't listen.
Now let me told you.
We came here to celebrate our anniversary. Even when we cut our cake, there was none except us, so we don't have any pictures of that moment. (Even the owner lives somewhere else)
The property is in it's worst shape. Uncle mainened that pre covid only.
The location is very far from all the visiting places. No food inside but yes kitchen is there u can cook.
Rooms are in very bad condition with very bad smell even I broomed my room so that I can sleep.
Most of the things are not in order.
I was very excited to see the kids area online but that's the worst part.
I can write an essay but showing you some pictures you guys can understand.
I cancelled my second day booking and going back today only.
Yes, don't be fooled by the internet photos and photos send by the owner he will send u the picture 100 years ago😜
If you don't wanna waste your money and your important day and don't want to be fooled and cheated.
Plz don't come here, until the  owner get this place maintained.
I want my day, my money and my time back. But that's no possible to trying to save another's.
That's it.
Regards
Anmolika
